name: Chance Dungeon
description:
• Manage your CHANCE to defeat enemies. 
  • Go deep into the dungeon to find hidden treasures. 
  • Turn-based combat puzzle game.
HOW TO PLAY
  • Defeat all enemies by using your chance.
  • Using chance to reinforce your actions.
  • You can use chance only once in a stage. (without item)
CONTROLS
  • [Z] Attack 
    • (normal) Deal Damage 1
    • (chance) Deal Damage 2
  • [X] Guard
    • (normal) Damage 1/2
    • (chance) Counter 
  • [Left Arrow] Move Left
    • (normal) Move 1
    • (chance) Move 2
  • [Right Arrow] Move Right
    • (normal) Move 1 
    • (chance) Move 2
  • [A] Toggle Chance
  • [R] Restart Current Level
